entry.name: AstraMilitarum/SupplyHaulDescription
entry.value: Allows adjacent allied troops to recover more quickly.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/SupplyHaulFlavor
entry.value: The Trojan unloads its cargo, distributing rations and ammunition amongst the weary Guardsmen at the back lines. Hot meals offer a moment of reprieve, but they will soon return to the front.
